mapper.select: select id, name, artist_img ->> "$.main_img" main_img from Artist
select id, name, artist_img ->> "$.main_img" main_img from Artist where name like '%${artistName}%' or korean_name like '%${artistName}%'
select art.id, art.name, artist_img ->> "$.main_img" main_img from Artist as art inner join Artist_record as ar on art.id = ar.id order by ar.search_count desc limit ${limit}
